description: Test suite for the AuthState class in a Flutter application, verifying authentication flow behaviors, state initialization, and listener notifications.

classes.name: AuthState
classes.description: State management class handling user authentication status, user data, loading/error states, and persistence integration.

methods.name: initializeAuth
methods.description: Method to initialize authentication state by reading token from secure storage.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Method to clear any existing error state.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user, clearing user data and authentication status.
